languages.text: {n}Маршал слегка подается вперед. Его голос низок, кажется, от его звука начинают вибрировать мраморные плиты дворца.{/n} "Делегация Адептус Арбитес прибыла с целью приветствовать преемника Леди Теодоры и удостовериться в возобновлении договоренностей, заключенных десятилетия назад".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маршал слегка подается вперед. Его голос низок, кажется, от его звука начинают вибрировать мраморные плиты дворца.{/n} "Делегация Адептус Арбитес прибыла с целью приветствовать преемника Леди Теодоры и удостовериться в возобновлении договоренностей, заключенных десятилетия назад".
traits.speaker: VP_Marshal

languages.text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал слегка подается вперед. Его голос низок, кажется, от его звука начинают вибрировать мраморные плиты дворца.{/n} "Делегация Адептус Арбитес прибыла с целью приветствовать преемника Леди Теодоры и удостовериться в возобновлении договоренностей, заключенных десятилетия назад".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

{n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace have begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Administratum delegation, accompanied by the Adeptus Arbites, has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and see to the extension of the decades-long arrangement."

{n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

{n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

{n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Administratum delegation, accompanied by the Adeptus Arbites, has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

{n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Administratum delegation, accompanied by the Adeptus Arbites, has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

{n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal se penche en avant. Il s'exprime d'une voix grave, et lorsqu'il prend la parole, on croirait presque que les dalles de marbre du palais se mettent à vibrer au diapason.{/n} « La délégation de l'Adeptus Arbites est ici aujourd'hui pour rendre hommage à l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de dame Théodora et veiller à la continuité d'un accord vieux de plusieurs décennies. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal se penche en avant. Il s'exprime d'une voix grave, et lorsqu'il prend la parole, on croirait presque que les dalles de marbre du palais se mettent à vibrer au diapason.{/n} « La délégation de l'Adeptus Arbites est ici aujourd'hui pour rendre hommage à l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de dame Théodora et veiller à la continuité d'un accord vieux de plusieurs décennies. »

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal se inclina hacia delante. Tiene una voz grave y, cuando habla, es como si las baldosas de mármol del palacio empezaran a vibrar.{/n} «La delegación del Adeptus Administratum Arbites ha llegado para saludar a{mf|l| la} sucesor{mf||a} de lady Theodora y debatir la extensión de nuestro acuerdo, establecido hace décadas».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal se inclina hacia delante. Tiene una voz grave y, cuando habla, es como si las baldosas de mármol del palacio empezaran a vibrar.{/n} «La delegación del Adeptus Administratum Arbites ha llegado para saludar a{mf|l| la} sucesor{mf||a} de lady Theodora y debatir la extensión de nuestro acuerdo, establecido hace décadas».

languages.text: {n}元帅向前倾了倾身子，开了口。他的声音非常低沉，仿佛宫殿的大理石瓷砖振动时发出的声音一般。{/n}“帝国法务部代表团向西奥多拉夫人的继承人致意，希望能继续维系我们长达数十年之久的盟约。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅向前倾了倾身子，开了口。他的声音非常低沉，仿佛宫殿的大理石瓷砖振动时发出的声音一般。{/n}“帝国法务部代表团向西奥多拉夫人的继承人致意，希望能继续维系我们长达数十年之久的盟约。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall lehnt sich nach vorne. Seine Stimme ist tief, und wenn er spricht, scheinen die Marmorfliesen des Palastes zu vibrieren.{/n} "Die Delegation des Adeptus Arbites ist gekommen, um Lady Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger|Nachfolgerin} zu begrüßen und unsere jahrzehntealte Übereinkunft zu erneuern."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall lehnt sich nach vorne. Seine Stimme ist tief, und wenn er spricht, scheinen die Marmorfliesen des Palastes zu vibrieren.{/n} "Die Delegation des Adeptus Arbites ist gekommen, um Lady Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger|Nachfolgerin} zu begrüßen und unsere jahrzehntealte Übereinkunft zu erneuern."

languages.text: {n}将帥は前屈みになる。彼の声は低く、彼が話すとき、宮殿の大理石が振動し始めるかのように感じられる。{/n}「帝国行政局代表団は、高等裁定局に伴われて、レディ・シオドーラの後継者に挨拶し、数十年に及ぶ取り決めを延長するために会いに来ました」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Administratum delegation, accompanied by the Adeptus Arbites, has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥は前屈みになる。彼の声は低く、彼が話すとき、宮殿の大理石が振動し始めるかのように感じられる。{/n}「帝国行政局代表団は、高等裁定局に伴われて、レディ・シオドーラの後継者に挨拶し、数十年に及ぶ取り決めを延長するために会いに来ました」

languages.text: {n}Miralay öne doğru eğiliyor. Sesi alçak çıkıp konuştuğunda sarayın mermer döşemeleri titriyormuş gibi bir hissiyat oluşuyor.{/n} "Adeptus Arbites heyeti, Leydi Theodora'nın halefini selamlamak ve on yıllardır süren anlaşmanın uzatmak için buradadır."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal leans forward. His voice is low, and when he speaks, it feels as though the marble tiles of the palace had begun to vibrate.{/n} "The Adeptus Arbites delegation has arrived to greet Lady Theodora's successor and to see to the extension of our decades-long arrangement."

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay öne doğru eğiliyor. Sesi alçak çıkıp konuştuğunda sarayın mermer döşemeleri titriyormuş gibi bir hissiyat oluşuyor.{/n} "Adeptus Arbites heyeti, Leydi Theodora'nın halefini selamlamak ve on yıllardır süren anlaşmanın uzatmak için buradadır."
